com.oopic - package com.oopic
Provides a set of classes which represent objects on the OOPic Microcontroller.
com.sri.common - package com.sri.common
Contains classes which are common to all types of applications including the core SR4 Kernel, modules, and clients.
com.sri.common.net - package com.sri.common.net
Contains a set of classes which are common to all application types and are used for network communication.
com.sri.kernel - package com.sri.kernel
Provides the core classes of the SR4 Kernel.
com.sri.kernel.comm - package com.sri.kernel.comm
Contains classes used for communications.
com.sri.kernel.i2c - package com.sri.kernel.i2c
Contains classes used in managing and using the I2C Bus.
com.sri.kernel.modules - package com.sri.kernel.modules
Contains classes which make up the module system of the SR4 Kernel.
com.sri.kernel.srml - package com.sri.kernel.srml
Provides classes for managing SRML elements and parsing SRML documents.
com.sri.modules.beacon - package com.sri.modules.beacon
Provides the module Beacon, an interface to the Triangulation hardware.
com.sri.modules.health - package com.sri.modules.health
Provides the module Health, an interface to the Diagnostic system.
com.sri.modules.httpd - package com.sri.modules.httpd
Provides the module Httpd, a simple web server.
com.sri.modules.magellan - package com.sri.modules.magellan
Provides the module Magellan, offering high level navigation.
com.sri.modules.mail - package com.sri.modules.mail
Provides the module Mail, a simple mail server and client.
com.sri.modules.modutils - package com.sri.modules.modutils
Provides the module Modutils, an interface to the kernel module system.
com.sri.modules.oopic - package com.sri.modules.oopic
Provides the module OOPic, an interface to the OOPic microcontroller.
com.sri.modules.sample - package com.sri.modules.sample
Provides the module Sample, a sample module.
com.sri.modules.speech - package com.sri.modules.speech
Provides the module Speech, an interface to the Text to Speech hardware.
com.sri.modules.srml - package com.sri.modules.srml
Provides the module SRML, a collection of basic SRML elements.
com.sri.modules.userpanel - package com.sri.modules.userpanel
Provides the module UserPanel, an interface to the robots User Panel.
